column2: eggs -1. In a large skillet over medium heat
column3: heat the chicken until cooked through.2. Remove the chicken from the pan and set aside.3. Crack the eggs into a bowl and beat them until they are light and fluffy.4. Pour the eggs into the skillet and cook until they are set.5. Add the cooked chicken back into the skillet and stir to combine.6. Serve hot.

column1: French Toast - Bread and Milk - 1. Crack 2 eggs into a medium bowl. Add ½ cup of milk
column3: and ¼ teaspoon of ground cinnamon to the bowl. Mix until combined.2. Dip each slice of bread in the egg mixture. Soak each slice for 1

column1: Fried Chicken and Rice - Chicken and Rice - 1. Prepare the chicken by coating it in flour and spices.2. Heat a generous amount of oil in a large skillet over a medium heat.3. Add the chicken to the skillet and cook each side until golden brown.4. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside on a plate.5. Add the cooked rice into the same skillet and heat through
column2: stirring occasionally.6. Once the rice is hot
column3: add back the chicken and stir together.7. Cook for a few additional minutes until everything is warmed through.8. Enjoy!

column2: Kimchi - Instructions1. Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. 2. Line a baking tray with foil and spray lightly with cooking oil. 3. Place the pork roast in the tray and pour the kimchi over the top.4. Cover with foil and bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes.5. Remove the foil and bake for an additional 30 minutes. 6. Let the roast cool for 10 minutes before serving. Enjoy!
